user.title: Set up Puzzle Game
user.description: Configure which AI assistant will generate puzzles. If you have multiple conversation agents (OpenAI, Google AI, Ollama, etc.), you can select which one to use.

start_game.name: Start Game
start_game.description: Start a new puzzle game or continue an existing one.

bonus.name: Bonus Game
bonus.description: If true, starts a bonus game instead of the daily puzzle.

submit_answer.name: Submit Answer
submit_answer.description: Submit an answer for the current word or theme.

reveal_letter.name: Reveal Letter
reveal_letter.description: Reveal a random letter in the current word. Uses one reveal credit.

skip_word.name: Skip Word
skip_word.description: Skip the current word and move to the next one. Only works in phase 1.

give_up.name: Give Up
give_up.description: End the game and reveal all answers.

set_session.name: Set Session
set_session.description: Set the voice session active state. Used by the blueprint.

active.name: Active
active.description: Whether the voice session is active.
